luo: Gidwaro gero laibrari manyalo ting'o jopuonjre 500,  stediam molworore manyalo ting'o ji 1000 kendo ma kar bet opangore  ka ng'as, ot moyang ne weche kompyuta kod kama jopuonjre nyalo bero talantagi kaachiel gi kama inyalo makie dwol."

eng: Construction of the resource centre was expected to take 18 months, from December 21 when the groundbreaking ceremony took place.
luo: Gedono ne onego okaw dweche 18, chakre Desemba tarik 21 chieng' ma ne otimie nyasi mar chako gedo.

eng: The local NG-CDF contributed Sh50 million towards the project.
luo: NG-CDF ma Homa Bay ne ogolo milion 50 ne gedono.

eng: A 77-year-old woman from East Kolwa in Kisumu East Sub-County has been taking care of abandoned teenage mothers and widows for 25 years now.
luo: Miyo moro ma jahigni  77 modak East Kolwa, Kisumu East Sab-Kaunti osebedo karito nyiri matindo mosenyuol kendo ojwang' kod mond liete ma bende ojwang'. Osebedo ka otimo kamano kuom higni 25.

eng: Florence Otieno says the initiative has enabled her to “give a second chance to a vulnerable group of women”.
luo: Florence Otieno wacho ni chenrono osemiye thuolo mar konyo joma mine ma jochan mondo ochak ngimagi manyien.

eng: Otieno first put up the rescue centre at her home in 1996 after being involved in a road accident, which left her partially paralysed.
luo: Florence ne oyawo dalane ne mine ma kamago e higa mar 1996 bang'  hinyore e masira mar  ndara ma ne omiyo dende konchiel otho.

eng: “The crash made me discover that life can be lost within a second. Due to that fact, I pledged to make the society I live in a better place by helping the vulnerable. In this case, it is majorly teenage mothers and the widows,” she told The Standard.
luo: Ne onyiso The Standard niya: "Masirano ne omiyo afwenyo ni kare ng'ato nyalo lalo ngimane ka diemo wang' nono. Nikech mano, ne asingora ni abiro timo kar nyalona mondo ngima obed maber matin e oganda madakie. Omiyo ne achako konyo nyithindo ma nyiri monyuol kod mond liete."

eng: The septuagenarian has thus far rescued 38 teenage mothers, and at least 12 widows.
luo: Nyaka chop sani, miyo ma koro hike oseniang'no osereso nyithindo manyiri 38 kod mond liete 12.

eng: As the number of girls increased in her rescue centre, so did her financial responsibility.
luo: Kaka kwan nyiri ne medore e kaka bende ne dwarore ni oti gi pesa momedore.

eng: Otieno said she, consequently, had to devise new survival methods.
luo: Florence wacho ni ne ochune manyo yore mamoko mag yuto, nono ne ok odhi nyalo.

eng: “I set aside a parcel of land for farming. The widows and the teenage mums would farm commercial crops, which we’d sell and use the proceeds to feed and clothe ourselves,” she said.
luo: Florence medo niya: "Ne aketo tenge puodho moro ma ne wabiroga puro. Mond lietego kaachiel gi nyirigo ne puro gik ma wauso. Ne wauso gigo kae to pesa ma wayudo wang'iewogo chiemo kod lewni."

eng: Other girls diversified into sandal, shoe and handbag-making business.
luo: Nyiri mamoko to ne ochako timo gik mopogore opogore, moko ne loso pat pat, moko wuoche to moko bege mag mine.

eng: They use material from water hyacinth harvested from Lake Victoria to make the products.
luo: Gitiyo gi hyacinth migolo e Nam Viktoria.

eng: The money raised under this initiative is used to finance the girls’ education.
luo: Pesa mowuok kanyo itiyogo e chulo ne gi skul.

eng: Teenage pregnancies continue to be a headache for national and county governments.
luo: Wach nyiri matindo ma nyuol chando sirkal ma Kenya kod sirkal mag Kaunti.

eng: Data by the Kenya Demographic and Health Survey (KDHS) indicates two out of ten girls in the country aged between 15 and 19 years are either pregnant or have given birth.
luo: Ripot moro mar Kenya Demographic and Health Survey kata (KDHS) nyiso ni nyiri ariyo kuom nyiri 10 manie kind higni 15 kod 19 nigi ich kata osenyuol.

eng: In Kisumu County, a multi-sectoral group headed by ODM leader Raila Odinga’s wife, Ida Odinga, is at the forefront in raising awareness against premarital sex.
luo: E Kaunti ma Kisumu, grup moro moriwo joma owuok e kidienje mopogore opogore, kendo motelne gi Ida Odinga ma jaod Raila Odinga, jatelo ma ODM, timo kinda ahinya e kwedo terruok e kind joma pok odonjo e kend.

eng: Otieno says her initiative has helped prevent some of the young girls in her centre from being exposed to sexual predators.
luo: Florence wacho ni chenroneno osekonyo moko kuom nyiri matindo mobiro dak kode kik lwar e lwet joma dwaro tiyo kodgi marach e weche terruok.

eng: Benta Awino, a mother of two, is one of the beneficiaries of Otieno’s rescue programme.
luo: Benta Awino, ma en min nyithindo ariyo, en achiel kuom joma chenrono osekonyo."

eng: Awino’s house in Orongo Village was recently deluged by heavy rains, which forced her to relocate. Otieno took the youthful widow in.
luo: Koth mang'eny ma nyocha ochue ne omiyo pi odonjo mi otimo ataro e od Awino ma en chi liel. Ne ochuno Awino dar."

eng: “I am thankful to Florence [Otieno] for starting this helpful cause,” she said with a light Duchenne smile.
luo: Awino wacho ka obwonjo mayom ni , "Adwoko erokamano ne  Florence kuom chako chenro ma jaberni mar konyo mine ma jochan."

eng: More than 2,200 families in Migori and Homa Bay counties have been displaced by floods following heavy rains.
luo: Koth mang'eny mosebedo ka chue osemiyo joudi mokalo 2,200 e Kaunti mag Migori kod  Homa Bay  odar.

eng: At Kakelo Kakoth location in Migori County, some 300 homes were submerged on Monday, forcing locals to move to safer grounds.
luo: Chieng' Wuok Tich koth maduong' ne ochue  e lokason ma Kakelo Kakoth e Kaunti ma Migori kendo pi ne otimo ataro e mier 300 mi ochuno jogo dar kamachielo.

eng: In Lower Karapolo,  60 households had been marooned by the floods while West Kanyuor location had 99 households affected by the floods.
luo: E Lower Karapolo,   pi ohula olorone mier 60 , to e lokason ma West Kanyuor  mier 99 oyudo chandruok nikech pi oula.

eng: According to Lower Central Kadem Chief Philip Orwa, areas around Kuja River such as Lwanda and Kuja were also flooded.
luo: Philip Orwa ma en Chif mar Lower Central Kadem wacho ni pi oula otimo ataro e alwora mar Nam Kuja. Kuom ranyisi pi otimo ataro Lwanda kod Kuja.

eng: Nyor Primary School teachers from Lwanda had to wade through knee-high waters to get to the school.
luo: Jopuonj ma Nyor Praimari Skul modak Lwanda ne oyoro pi machopo e chongegi mondo eka gichop e skul.

eng: Young pupils skipped school for fear of being carried away by floods.
luo: Nyithi skul to ne obare ne skul nikech ne giluor ni pi nyalo terogi.

eng: The school’s headteacher Elisha Ondiek noted that learners from Kuja area had a hard time getting to school.
luo: Elisha Ondiek ma en Japuonj maduong' ma Nyor Praimari ne owacho ni chopo e skul tek ahinya ne nyithi skul.

eng: Kabuto Primary School, Nyora Primary School, Angugo Primary School and Molly Secondary School were also among the flooded schools.
luo: Moko kuom skunde ma pi oula otimoe ataro gin kaka Kabuto Praimari Skul, Nyora Praimari Skul, Angugo Primairi Skul kod Molly Sekondari Skul.

eng: Hundreds of families have been displaced in Rachuonyo North due to heavy rains which have pounded Homa Bay County in the last three days.
luo: Nikech koth mang'eny mosebedo kachwe Homa Bay Kaunti e ndalo adek mokalogi, joudi miche osedar kawuok Rachuonyo North.

eng: More than 100 households were displaced in Kogembo sub-location in Rachuonyo North sub-county.
luo: Joudi mokalo 100 bende osedar e miechgi Kogembo sab locason e sab Kaunti ma Rachuonyo North.

eng: The floods occurred after River Awach broke its banks.
luo: Atarago ne obedoe bang' Nam Awach oo.

eng: According to Kogembo Assistant Chief Hezekiah Owino, the floods began on Monday night.
luo: Hezekiah Owino ma en Asistant Chif ma Kogembo wacho ni pi ne ochako timo ataro Wuok Tich gotieno.

eng: Simbi primary and Simbi secondary schools were also flooded.
luo: Pi ne otimo ataro Simbi praimari kod Simbi sekondari bende.

eng: At Nyapuodi village in Kanam A location in the same sub-county, hundreds of families were affected too.
luo: Joudi miche bende ne ochandore nikech pi motimo ataro e gweng' mar  Nyapuodi e lokason ma Kanam e sab Kaunti achielno.

eng: “At Nyapuodi beach, four houses fell after heavy rains. Our roads are impassable,” said George Orimba, a local resident.
luo: George Orimba modak  Nyapuodi beach, wacho niya: "Ute ang'wen osepodho nikech koth mang'eny mosebedo ka chwe. Kendo nderniwa ok kalre."

eng: In Kobala sub-location in the same sub-county, many families were displaced after their houses were marooned by floods.
luo: Joudi mang'eny bende ne odar Kobala sab lokason ka ne ataro olworo miechgi kendo odinonegi.

eng: In Ndhiwa sub-county, hundreds of families were affected by floods after River Kuja broke its banks.
luo: Joudi miche e Ndhiwa sab kaunti bende ne ochandore ka pi ne otimo ataro bang' Nam Kuja mwomo.

eng: Residents have appealed to government agencies for humanitarian aid.
luo: Jokuno kwayo riwruoge mag sirkal mondo okonygi gi gik mochuno kaka chiemo.

eng: “We appeal to the government to intervene and rescue us,” said John Odiembo, a resident of Ndhiwa.
luo: John Odiembo modak Ndhiwa wacho niya: "Wakwayo sirkal mondo obi oreswa."

eng: Meanwhile, farm produce worth millions of shillings has been destroyed in Naivasha due to heavy rains.
luo: "To komachielo, chiemo moromo kelo siling milionde osekethore e puothe mag Naivasha nikech koth mang'eny mosebedo kachwe. "

eng: The most affected is Mirera estate off the Naivasha-Mai Mahiu road.
luo: Kama chiemo okethoree mogik en Mirera estate. Mondo ng'ato  ochop kuno, ng'ato baro kawuok e ndara ma Naivasha-Mai Mahiu .

eng: The road between Mirera and Karagita was completely flooded, forcing motorists to seek alternatives routes.
luo: Ndara man e kind Mirera kod Karagita bende otimo ataro kendo chuno jo mtokni luwo yore mopogore.

eng: Also rendered impassable was the road linking Kijabe Mission Hospital to Moi South Lake.
luo: Ndara mawuok Kijabe Mission Hospital nyaka  Moi South Lake bende ok kalre.

eng: According to Njoki Nyanjui, one of the affected farmers, the flooding started on Sunday following heavy rains in the upper catchment area.
luo: Njoki Nyanjui, ma en achiel kuom joma puothegi otimo ataro, wacho ni pi oula ne ochako timo ataro Jumapil bang koth maduong' chwe e gwenge man yo ka malo.

eng: She said the waters had flooded their farms and roads, leaving a trail of destruction.
luo: Owacho ni puothegi kod ndernigo otimo ataro kendo gik moko okethre nyowuoyo.

eng: Njoki called on the county government to address the issue of drainage, terming it a major challenge facing the area.
luo: Njoki ne okwayo sirkal ma kaunti mondo okaw okang' mar loso yore ma pi oula kaloe. Owacho ni pi oula keloga chandruok maduong' e alworano.

eng: According to a message sent by the Red Cross, there were indications that the ongoing rains could cause more floods in the region.
luo: Kaluwore gi ripot moro mar jo Red Cross, nenore ni koth madhi nyimeni, dhi medo kelo ataro e  alworano.

eng: KeNHA warns motorists against using Goye crossing as floods wreak havoc
luo: Riwruok mar KeNHA siemo jo mtokni ni kaka pi oula dhi nyime timo ataro, kik giluw Goye crossing.

eng: Kenya National Highways Authority (KeNHA) has warned motorists against crossing Goye causeway due to the overflowing Lake Victoria.
luo: Riwruok mar Kenya National Highways Authority (KeNHA) siemo jo mtokni ni nikech Nam Viktoria ma koro o, kik giluw daraja ma Goye.

eng: According to KeNHA, the situation is as a result of the heavy rainfall pounding the Nyanza region, affecting sections of the Lake Victoria basin.
luo: "KeNHA wacho ni Nam o nikech koth mang'eny mosebedo kachwe e alwora mar Nyanza, kendo mano osekelo chandruok ne joma odak e alwora mar Nambno."

eng: "Since there is no alternative access to Osieko, we wish to advise motorists along that section not to attempt crossing the overtopped section, and to only cross when water levels are low," said KeNHA.
luo: Giwacho ni, "Nikech onge yo machielo mar chopo Osieko, wakwayo jo mtokni ni kik gitem kalo daraja ma pi oumono, girit nyaka pi dog chien."

eng: The authority further warned trucks against using the crossing as they evaluate mechanisms of undertaking works on the structure.
luo: KeNHA ne owacho ni loche ok onego okal darajano, pod ginono kaka ginyalo medo tego darajano.

eng: Goye crossing, which was built in 1975, was estimated to operate for 20 years before a new one could be built.
luo: Ne oger daraja ma Goye  e higa mar 1975. Ka ne igere, ne owach ni onyalo tiyo kuom higni 20 kae to igero daraja machielo.

eng: On Wednesday, commuters were stranded for the better part of the day as they waited for the water levels to go down.
luo: Pi ne odino ne jowuoth chieng' Tich Adek mi girito chiegni odiechieng' mangima mondo pi odog chien.

eng: Onyango Oduma, a driver, told The Standard that he has not reported to work because of the condition of the road. "I've not been able to cross to the other side to get sand for my clients."
luo: Onyango Oduma, ma en dereva ne owacho ne The Standard ni pok odhi e tich nikech chal mar ndara. "Ok anyal ng'ado dhi lokacha omo kuoyo ne kastembega."

eng: Oduma said the failure by the government to construct the bridge despite numerous complaints from the residents has led to the current situation, adding several operations have been affected.
luo: Oduma wacho ni chandruogni obedoe nikech sirkal ok osewinjo ywak mang'eny mag jo kanyo mondo ogernegi daraja manyien. Owacho ni tije mang'eny e alworano osechung' nikech darajano.

eng: Last week, transport along the busy road was paralysed for hours following an accident.
luo: Juma mokalo, mtokni ne ok nyal ringo e ndarano kuom seche mang'eny nikech masira mar ndara ma ne otimore.

eng: Residents called on the government to repair the road to save them costs they incur and the time they waste using the dilapidated road.
luo: Raia ma kanyo kwayo sirkal mondo olosnegi ndarano mondo giwe tiyo gi pesa mang'eny kendo ketho seche sama gitiyo gi ndara ma koro osekethoreno.

eng: A truck overturned and blocked the road leading to a snarl-up.
luo: Lori moro ne opodho mi olokore ataro e chuny ndara modino yo. Omiyo mtokni ne ochanore e ndara ma onge kama gikalie.

eng: A commuter, Dorothy Achieng who had an appointment at Got Agulu Hospital, said she was forced to walk for more than two kilometres.
luo: Dorothy Achieng, ma ne nie achiel kuom mtoknigo ne dhi Got Agulu Hospital. Owacho ni ne ochune wuotho gi tiende kilomita ariyo nikech mtokni ne ok nyal ringo.

eng: Aggrey Ochieng, a resident, termed the road critical to the economy of the county and accused local leaders of neglecting it. “We have raised the issue with the MP, governor and KeNHA but nothing has been done.”
luo: Aggrey Ochieng, modak e alworano wacho ni ndara en gima dwarore ahinya mondo dongruok moro amora obedie e yore mag yuto e kauntino. Owacho ni jotelo ma kanyo osefwayo wach loso ndarano. Owacho niya: "Wasetero wach ndara ne jabungewa,  ne gavana kendo ne riwruok mar KeNHA, to onge gima gisetimo."

eng: Elisha Odhiambo, a resident of Usenge Town, said they were spending a lot of money on car repairs.
luo: Elisha Odhiambo modak Usenge Taon  wacho ni gitiyo gi pesa mang'eny ahinya e loso mtokni nikech ndara marachno.

eng: Matatus and boda boda riders have also hiked fares, said Odhiambo.
luo: Odhiambo medo ni, "Jo matatu kod jo boda boda bende osemedo nengo ahinya nikech ndarano."

eng: Yesterday, KeNHA said that there were plans of constructing a permanent bridge.
luo: KeNHA nyoro owacho ni gin gi chenro mar gero daraja machielo motegno.

eng: "Procurement process is underway to solve the rising Lake Victoria water levels at that crossing," KeNHA said.
luo: "KeNHA ne owacho niya: ""Wasechako ng'iewo gik loso daraja mondo watiek chandruok ma jabedoga e darajani kinde ma Nam Viktoria opong'."

eng: Five suspected terrorists arrested in Kisumu on Sunday have been transferred to Nairobi as detectives move to finalise investigations.
luo: Jomahundu abich ma ne omak Kisumu chieng' Jumapil oter Nairobi mondo polise otiek nono wechegi kuno.

eng: On Monday, a Kisumu court granted the police 10 more days to continue holding the suspects for interrogation.
luo: Chieng' Wuok Tich, kot moro Kisumu ne omiyo polise rusa mar keto jogo e sel kuom ndalo 10 momedore mondo gimed yudo weche kuomgi.

eng: Yesterday, detectives from the Anti-Terror Police Unit drove the suspects to their headquarters at the Directorate of Criminal Investigations for further questioning.
luo: Nyoro, polise ma jonon wach matiyo gi  Anti-Terror Police Unit ne otero jogo e mtoka nyaka ofisgi maduong' man  Directorate of Criminal Investigations mondo omed non-gi.

eng: The suspects are Jamal Muhamud, Abdul Razzaq, Nadeed Muhammad, Amin Muhammad and Younas Muhammad, all of Pakistani origin.
luo: Jomahundugo ne gin Jamal Muhamud, Abdul Razzaq, Nadeed Muhammad, Amin Muhammad kod Younas Muhammad, giduto gin jo Pakistan.

eng: A detective privy to the investigations said that the suspects had travelled in two groups through the Kenya-Uganda border.
luo: Polis moro mong'eyo wechego wacho ni jogo ne owuotho e grube ariyo kendo ne gidonjo Kenya ka gikalo boda ma Kenya gi Uganda.

eng: The suspects had done their best to shake off police officers before hawk-eyed officers nabbed two of them in Kombewa in Kisumu following a tip-off.
luo: Jomahundugo ne osetemo ahinya pondo ne polis, kata kamano, polise ma akicha ma ne oyudo osekwalnegi wach ne omakogi Kombewa, Kisumu.

eng: An interrogation of the suspects established that another group had also made its way in to Kenya and was on its way to Kericho.
luo: Nonro ma ne otim kuom jomahundugo ne ofwenyo ni grup machielo bende ne odonjo Kenya kendo ne gin e yo ka gidhi Kericho.

eng: This prompted police officers to mount a roadblock at Ahero and searched all vehicles from Kisumu.
luo: Mano ne omiyo polise odino ndara  Ahero  kendo goyo peksen mtokni duto mawuok Kisumu.

eng: “They were keen on escaping and even alighted at Ahero and started walking back when they learnt officers were on their trail,” said a detective privy to the investigations.
luo: Polis machielo mong'eyo wechego wacho ni jogo ne otemo ahinya mondo kik makgi. Sama ne gifwenyo ni polise luwogi, ne gilor Ahero kae to gichako wuotho ka gidok Kisumu.

eng: The detectives are also probing some of the people they might have contacted.
luo: Polise bende nono joma nyalo bedo ni ne giwuoyogo.

eng: It is  unclear whether they had intentions of carrying out attacks but the police indicated that their behaviour and some of the items they had aroused suspicion
luo: Ok ong'ere maber kane gidwaro timo timbe mag mahundu.  Kata kamano, polise wacho ni timbegi kod moko kuom gik ma ne oyudgigo, miyo gichich kodgi.

eng: A detective involved in the case said the suspects were found with "many" telephone gadgets and military regalia.
luo: Polis moro ma ne onono jogo wacho ni ne oyudgi gi gik simu mang'eny kod yunifom mag jolweny.

eng: Yesterday, Kisumu County Commander Samuel Anampiu confirmed the suspects had been transferred to Nairobi.
luo: Nyoro, Samuel Anampiu ma en Kamanda mar Kisumu Kaunti ne owacho ni oseter jogo Nairobi.

eng: “We transferred them to Nairobi for ease and convenience of processing,” said Anampiu.
luo: Anampiu ne omedo niya: “Waterogi Nairobi mondo nonogi obed mayot."

eng: The changing face of Siaya town thanks to devolution
luo: Nikech sirkal moter e Kaunti, lokruoge mabeyo timore Siaya.

eng: The face of Siaya town has tremendously changed thanks to devolution that has not only attracted investors in the once sleepy, dusty town but seen the initiation of a number of projects.
luo: Siaya taon osegerore nyowuoyo nikech sirkal moter e kauntino. Kuom higni mang'eny  Siaya taon oseng'ere kaka taon motimo buru kendo monindo aninda. Kata kamano, nikech oter sirkal kuno, mano oseywayo jo ohala kendo osemiyo ochak chenro mang'eny mag dongruok.

eng: Development projects are slowly changing the fortunes of the town that has struggled to find a footing despite it being the headquarters of the county but questions have been raised on the amount spent on some of the projects.
luo: Mos mos chenro mag dongruok konyo e yore mag yuto e taondno. Kata kamano, ji chich gi kwan mar pesa miwacho ni otigo e chenro mamoko mag taondno.

eng: Siaya town has grown from a market formally known as Ahindi years ago to the district headquarters and now to county headquarters.
luo: Siaya taon osetimo dongruok mang'eny. Higni machon ne en mana chiro miluongo ni Ahindi, kae to obedo taon maduong' mar distrikt, sani to en taon maduong' mar Kaunti.

eng: Among the projects changing the face of Siaya is the Sh340 million Siaya High Court building that is nearing completion.
luo: Achiel kuom dongruoge madongo maloko kit Siaya en od Kot Maduong' ma Siaya migero sani. Odno igero gi milion 340  kendo ochiegni rumo.

eng: Judiciary Chief Registrar Ann Amadi inspected the building last December and gave it a clean bill of health saying the works were almost complete.
luo: Ann Amadi ma en  Judiciary Chief Registrar ne onono Odno Desemba mokalo. Ne owacho ni tich otire maber kendo ni odno chiegni rumo.

eng: The county government also recently spent Sh43 million on Ahindi Gardens and the governor’s park that were commissioned by Devolution Cabinet Secretary Eugene Wamalwa.
luo: Sirkal ma kaunti nyocha otiyo gi milion 43 e loso Ahindi Gardens kod kar bayo mar gavana. Eugene Wamalwa ma en Jatelo Maduong' e Weche Sirkal mag Kaunti ema ne oketo seyi mondo chenrogo odhi nyime.

eng: Wamalwa also commissioned the new Sh75 million county headquarters.
luo: Wamalwa bende ne oketo seyi mondo oger ofis manyien mar kaunti madhi kawo milion 75.

eng: The county government has also spent Sh165 million on renovating the Siaya County Referral Hospital.
luo: Sirkal ma kauntino bende osetiyo gi milion 165 e loso  Siaya County Referral Hospital.

eng: Governor Cornel Rasanga said another ongoing project is Sh400million ultra-modern stadium which is 90 per cent complete.
luo: Gavana Cornel Rasanga wacho ni gedo machielo moseger pasent 90 en stediam manyasani ma okawo milion 400.

eng: The Sh100 million street lighting project by National Government and tarmac roads within town that were part of the Siaya-Nyadorera highway project, have also contributed to the town’s new look.
luo: Gik moko ariyo ma bende osemedo loko kit taon ma Siaya gin: chenro mar Sirkal mar Kenya  mar keto stima e nderni. Chenrono ne okawo milion 100. Gimachielo en chenro mar Sirkal ma Kenya mar keto lam e nderni maringo e Siaya taon, chenrono otudore gi chenro mar ndara ma ne oger kowuok Siaya nyaka Nyadorera.

eng: Kennedy Onyango, a resident of Siaya town said some of the projects such as the street lighting project were as a result of the goodwill that had been bolstered by the Handshake between ODM leader Raila Odinga and President Uhuru Kenyatta.
luo: Kennedy Onyango, modak Siaya wacho ni moko kuom dongruok mosebedoe kaka wach keto stima e nderni ma Siaya obiro nikech winjruok ma ne omedo bedoe e kind jatelo mar ODM Raila Odinga kod Ker Uhuru Kenyatta bang' Mosruok.

eng: John Odhiambo, also a resident, noted there was a big improvement on the face of Siaya but raised concerns on the cost of most of the projects, especially those done by the county government.
luo: John Odhiambo, ma bende odak Siaya oyie ni osetim dongruok mang'eny Siaya kata kamano, ochich gi pesa mang'eny mokalo miwacho ni otigo e chenro moko, to ahinya ahinya e chenro mag sirkal ma kaunti.

eng: Walter Okello, the Lands chief officer said the county government has also started demolishing temporary structures to create order and improve the image of the town.
luo: Walter Okello, ma en Jatelo mar Lowo, wacho ni sirkal ma kaunti osechako muko udi maricho richo manie taon mondo gikel chenro maber e taon kendo gi med bero taondno.

eng: He added that there is need for residents with old buildings within the town to renovate them so they conform with the standards of a town.
luo: Owacho ni dwarore ni jokanyo ma nigi udi moti e taon olos udigigo mondo ginen maber kaka udi mamoko e taon.

eng: We have currently stopped renewing leases of those with old buildings unless they are renovated.
luo: Gie sani, ok wami joma udigi oti lease (ratiro ma sirkal miyo ji kinde ka kinde mar tiyo gi lowo) mak mana ka gigero udigigo maber.

eng: “Those with temporary structures that will be demolished have also been showed a trading area within town where they are required to put up their business structures,” Okello said.
luo: Okello ne owacho ni Joma nigi ute maricho richo mibiro muk osesiemnegi kar ohala e alwora mar taon ma onego gigerie ute ohala.

eng: Professor Paul Achola, who is the chair of the municipality board in the county, says several years ago, Siaya was just a market and social centre but it has grown.
luo: Profesa Paul Achola, ma en jakom mar munisipal mar bod ma kaunti wacho ni higni mang'eny mokalo Siaya ne en mana chiro kod kama ji ne biro bayoe, to gie sani, Siaya osedongo.

eng: He said in 1940s, the current Siaya town was only known as Ahindi market where people came to purchase food and household products.
luo: Owacho ni e higni mag  1940 Siaya taon masani, ne en mana chiro ma Ahindi. Ji ne biro ng'iewo chiemo kod gik ot.

eng: It was also a social centre for sporting activities before it became the district headquarters.
luo: Kae to obedo kar tuke kaka spot kapok obedo taon maduong' mar distrikt.

eng: Rasanga said that the development projects are sufficient evidence that devolution is working.
luo: Rasanga wacho ni dongruok matimore sani nyiso maler ni wach tero sirkal e kaunti tiyo maber.

eng: “Evidently, the county government of Siaya continues to implement projects with a view of improving the socio-economic well-being of the citizens and changing the landscape of Siaya town,” Rasanga noted.
luo: Rasanga wacho ni, "Nenore ni sirkal ma kaunti mar Siaya dhi nyime kelo dongruok ma konyo e yore ohala kendo medo bero ngima ji e oganda. Lokruogego loko kit Siaya taon."

eng: “My government’s partnership with the World Bank through Kenya Devolution Support Programme and Kenya Urban Support Programme have since seen us implement some key projects in the county.”
luo: “Riwruok ma sirkanda osebedogo kanyachiel gi  World Bank kokalo kuom Kenya Devolution Support Programme kod Kenya Urban Support Programme osekonyowa timo dongruok madongo e kauntini.”

eng: Siaya Governor Cornel Rasanga was put in a spot for allegedly spending more money from the county emergency fund than the initial budget in the fight against Covid-19.
luo: Ne openj Gavana ma Siaya, Cornel Rasanga gimomiyo ne otiyo gi pesa mang'eny moloyo ma ne owal ni otigo e kedo gi masira mar Korona. Pesano ne wuok e aguch masira mar kaunti.

eng: In a virtual meeting with the Senate Standing Committee on Health yesterday, Mr Rasanga was hard-pressed to explain where he got Sh115 million for Covid-19 related activities yet the money allocated to the county emergency fund was Sh100 million.
luo: E romo ma ne gitimo e intanet nyoro gi  Senate Standing Committee on Health, ne oket Mr Rasanga kama diny mondo oler kama ne ogoloe milion 115 ma ne otigo e weche motudre gi masira mar Korona to pesa ma kaunti ne owalo ne masirano ne en mana milion 100.

eng: The Auditor General's special audit report on utilisation of Covid-19 funds by counties, flagged over-expenditure from the county emergency fund in Siaya.
luo: "Ripot makende mar  Auditor General (Jatelo maduong' manono kaka pesa otiyo) e wi kaka kaunti duto otiyo gi pesa ma ne giwalo ne Masira mar Korona, ne onyiso ni kaunti ma Siaya ne ogolo e aguchgi mar masira pesa mang'eny mokalo ma ne giwinjore ni gigol."

eng: “It was established that as of 31 July 2020, Sh115,884,928 had been committed for Covid-19 related activities which was against the approved budget allocated to the county emergency fund for Covid-19 purposes,” read the statement in part.
luo: Ripotno ne wacho niya: “Wachore ni chop Julai 31  2020, ne nenore maler ni ne oseti kod siling 115,884,928 e weche motudre gi masira mar Korona, to mano ne gwenyore gi pesa ma  bajet nyiso ni  kaunti ne onego otigo e masirano.”

eng: But the governor said the county only spent Sh100 million and not Sh115 million as the special audit report indicated.
luo: Gavana to ne wacho ni kaunti ne otiyo mana gi milion 100 to ok milion 115 ma ripot makendeno nyiso.

eng: There may be an error but I can confirm that we did not spend more than Sh100 million.
luo: Nyalo bedo ni nitiere both kamoro e kwanono, kata kamano, anyalo kelonu nonro manyiso ni  ne ok watiyo gi pesa mokalo milion 100.

eng: "I can confirm that all commitments were charged within the funds. There was no over expenditure,” Rasanga told the committee.
luo: Wasanga ne owacho ne komitino niya:"Anyalo nyisou gadier ni ne watiyo mana gi pesa ma ne kaunti ne owalo ne masira mar Korona. Ok ne watiyo gi pesa mokalo kanyo.”

eng: The Auditor General defended the report, saying there was proof of payment vouchers amounting to Sh115 million.
luo: Auditor General ne owacho ni ripot ma en-gono ni kare, ne nitiere riside manyiso ni ne ochul milion 115.

eng: The committee questioned the conflicting information from the county and AG.
luo: Komiti ne openjo gimomiyo weche kaunti kod weche AG gwenyore.

eng: “So where did the Auditor General get the findings if the governor is insisting that the amount used was Sh100 million? Did the report come from the sky?” Posed Narok Senator Ledama ole Kina.
luo: Seneta ma Narok Ledama ole Kina ne openjo niya: “Kare Auditor General ogolo nonrone kanye, ka gavana oramo ni ne otiyo mana gi milion 100? Kwandeno owuok e polo?"

eng: The committee chair Kisumu Senator Fred Outa however, demanded that the governor provides proof of expenditure.
luo: Kata kamano, jakom mar komitino ma en Seneta ma Kisumu Fred Outa ne owacho ni gavana okelnegi ripot manyiso kaka ne otiyo gi pesa."

eng: “We will give you one week to provide evidence that you did not spend more than Sh100 million,” Mr Outa stated.
luo: Mr Outa ne owacho niya: “Wamiyi juma achiel mondo ikelnwa ripot manyiso ni ne ok itiyo gi pesa mokalo milion 100."

eng: Siaya appropriated Sh270 million in respect to Covid-19 and related emergencies out of which Sh100 million was from the county emergency fund with the county receiving Sh60 million on July 3 and another Sh40 million on July 14 respectively.
luo: Siaya ne owalo siling milion 270 ne masira mar Korona. Milion 100 ne dhi wuok e agulu mar kaunti mar masira. Ne omi kaunti milion 60 Julai, tarik 7 kendo ne omedgi milion 40 Julai tarik 14.

eng: Other funds received by the county are government conditional grants worth Sh97 million, Danida Sh6 million, national government health workers allowance Sh36 million and Kenya Devolution Support Programme (KSDP) Sh30 million.
luo: Pesa mamoko ma ne kaunti oyudo ne gin: Pesa mowuok e sirkal kendo moketne chik mitiyogo, milion 97, Danida ne ochiwo milion 6, Sirkal ma Kenya ne ochiwo pes jothieth milion 36 kendo Kenya Devolution Support Programme (KSDP) ne ochiwo milion 30 million.

eng: Rasanga was also faulted for not spending KSDP and the government’s conditional grants in good time.
luo: Ketho mamoko bende ne oyudre kuom Rasanga. Ne ok otiyo gi pesa mar  KSDP kod pesa ma ne sirkal ochiwo moketne chik e kinde mowinjore.

eng: “As at the time of the audit the conditional grant and KSDP were still held in the Siaya county Covid-19 fund account and the Siaya County KSDP respectively. This was attributed to absence of approved budgets, work plans, and procurement plans to facilitate spending,” the report said.
luo: "“Gie kinde ma ne inono kwand kaunti, pesa ma ne sirkal ochiwo moketne chik kod pesa mar KSDP ne pod nie aguch masira ma Siaya kaunti kod aguch KSDP ma Siaya kaunti. Ripot wacho ni mano ne otimore nikech podi ne ok oket seyi e bajet ma ne owinjore otigo, ne onge chenro moket mar tiyo gi pesago kendo ne pok olos chenro mar ng'iepo gi pesago.

eng: The governor said the KSDP funds were used to purchase Covid-19 supplies.
luo: Gavan ne owacho ni pesa mar  KSDP ne otigo e ng'iewo gik ma ne konyo ji nyagore gi Korona.

eng: Commitment for isolation which represented 71 per cent of the funds could only be paid out on completion of the isolation centres."
luo: Pesa mar loso kuonde ma joma nigi tuwo mar Korona betie ne dhi kawo pasent 71 mar pesago, to ne inyalo mana chul pesago ka osetiek gero kuondego.

eng: At the time of the audit, the funds had been committed and the service providers/contractors were at various stages of delivery/completion of isolation centres which had not reached the payments stage, and hence the un-utilisation of funds at that time,” he explained.
luo: E kinde ma ne inono kwanono noyudo ka osewinjruok e wi pesa ma ibiro chul ji. Jogedo gi jomamoko ne dhi nyime tiyo, kata kamano, ne pok gitieko kendo ne pok ochulgi. Mano emomiyo pesago pod ne nitie.

eng: Student almost missed national test due to illness
luo: Nyathi skul ne chiegni bare ne skul nikech tuwo.

eng: Towards the end of 2020, Henry Madaga was down with complications related to ulcers.
luo: Tuwo mar ich ne oketo Henry Madaga piny e giko higa mar 2020.

eng: He spent a number of weeks on treatment to the point of contemplating missing out on the Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education examination.
luo: Ne othiedho iye kuom jumbe mogwaro kendo ne ochako paro ni onego owe ma ok otimo penj mar  Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education.

eng: But yesterday, Madaga, 18, was all smiles as Education CS George Magoha read his name as one of the top performers, after he scored an A plain, and emerged the eighth best countrywide.
luo: Kata kamano, nyoro Madaga ma jahigni 18 ne mor matamre ginono sama George Magoha Jatelo mar Somo, ne somo nyinge e kind nyithindo motimo maber moloyo e penjno. Madaga ne oyudo A mochung' kata A plain, kendo ne en namba aboro e Kenya duto.

eng: The first-born in a family of five, who wants to become a doctor, was at his uncle’s clothes’ shop in Kisumu when the results were released.
luo: Madaga en kayo e odgi, gin nyithindo abich kendo odwaro bedo laktar. Ne oyudo en e duk lewni mar ner mare sama ne ogol dwoko mar penjno.

eng: The alumnus of Maranda High School said: “I did not know I would manage to sit the examination. The sickness put me down, but I thank God I overcome it.”
luo: Madaga ma ne osomo Maranda High School wacho niya: “Ne ok ang'eyo ni anyalo timo penjno. Tuwono ne oketa piny, kata kamano, adwoko ne Nyasaye erokamano ni ne aloyo tuwono.”

eng: When The Standard caught up with him at the shop in Chichwa Market, he still appeared weak.
luo: Kane jofwamb weche mag The Standard oyude e duka mar ner mare, Chichwa Market, ne pod onenore mool.

eng: Persistence kept him going, he said, adding that he would like to join the University of Nairobi.
luo: Sinani ne omiyo aloyo lwenyno, owacho ni doher dhi e Yunivasiti ma Nairobi.

eng: Paul Kaunda, who was Madaga’s head teacher at Kosau Primary in Kisumu County, was elated by the performance.
luo: Paul Kaunda, ma ne en japuonj maduong' e praimari skul ma ne  Madaga osomoe ne mor sidang' gi kaka Madaga okalo penj.

eng: Madaga was Kosau’s best in the Kenya Certificate of Primary Education.
luo: Madaga ema ne omako namba Kosau e penj mar Kenya Certificate of Primary Education.

eng: “He didn’t have school fees to join Form One, and we asked the then Maranda principal to admit him,” Kaunda said.
luo: Kaunda ne owacho ni, “Madaga ne onge skul fis mar donjo e sekondari, kata kamano ne wawuoyo gi japuonj Maduong' ma Maranda mondo orwake e skundno.”

eng: A family in Ogango, Manga Sub-county in Nyamira, is in distress following the disappearance of their kin after he left school more than three months ago.
luo: "Joot moko modak  Ogango, Manga sab kaunti  Nyamira, chunygi chandore ahinya nikech wuodgi molal. Wuodgino ne owuok e skul dweche adek mokalo."

eng: According to the boy’s mother, Jane Mirambo, the family was not aware that he was missing until two days after schools closed for the Easter holidays.
luo: Jane Mirambo ma en min wuoyino wacho ni ne gikiya ni nyathigi olal. Owacho ni ne ging'eyo mana ndalo ariyo mokalo kane olor skunde nikech rusa  mar Easter.

eng: “I waited for Kevin to come home but he didn’t show up. When we went to school to inquire about his whereabouts, we were told he had not been seen for nearly the entire term,” the mother told The Standard.
luo: Min nyathino ne onyiso The Standard niya: “Ne arito Kevin mondo oduog to ne ok anene. Kane wadhi e skul mondo wapenj wachne ne onyiswa ni pok ginene chiegni tam mangima."

eng: She said they reported her son’s missing at Sengera Police Station under OB 7/23/0/2021.
luo: Owacho ne ni gitero ripot mar lal mar wuodgino Sengera Polis Stesen, momigi namba mar OB 7/23/0/2021.

eng: Ever since, it has been a blame game between the school administration and the family over who should bear responsibility for the missing boy.
luo: A kanyo en mana ywaruok e kind joskul gi joodgi Kevin. Joskul wacho ni joodgi Kevin ema ne ok okawo ting' margi, to joodgi Kevin wacho ni Joskul ema ne ok okawo ting'gi.

eng: An exit sheet recorded by the school administration and which was shared with police shows that Kevin Machuki, a Form One student at Nyaisa SDA Mixed Day and Boarding School, had left the institution on January 10 to attend a funeral at home.
luo: Otas moro ma ne joskul ondiko ma bende ne gimiyo polise nyiso ni  Kevin Machuki, ja Fom 1, Nyaisa SDA Mixed Day and Boarding School, ne owuok e skul Januar tarik 10 ka odhi e liel e dalagi.

eng: “We are not aware of any funeral at home this year. The report is untrue,” Anne Kemunto, the boy’s sister-in-law said.
luo: Anne Kemunto ma en chi owadgi Kevin wacho ni; “Ok wang'eyo liel moro amora ma ne obedo e dalawa higani. Ripodno ok en adier."

eng: Remarks on the records of official communication between the school administration and Kevin’s mother indicates she could not be reached on phone to be alerted that her son had secured an exit from school to attend a funeral at home.
luo: Weche ma skul ondiko e wi tudruok mosebedo e kindgi kod min Kevin nyiso ni ne ok ginyal yudo min Kevin e simu mondo ginyise ni wuode ne omi rusa mar biro e liel dala.

eng: However, a text message is said to have been sent to the parent to that effect.
luo: Kata kamano, skul wacho ni ne gioro  ne min Kevin ote mar simu ma ne nyise wachno.

eng: “We could not deny the boy permission to attend a funeral, especially after he insisted he had to. After desperately trying to reach the mother on phone, we decided to let the boy go."
luo: “Ne ok wanyal tamo wuoyino dhi e liel kane oramo ni nyaka odhi. Bang' temo gi kinda yudo min-gi e simu to otamore, ne wang'ado mar miyo wuoyino rusa mondo odhi e dala."

eng: "A follow-up when he failed to report back a few days later was difficult since the mother could not be reached. The parent’s phone was off all the time,” Tobias Omollo, the school principal, said.
luo: Tobias Omollo ma en japuonj maduong' e skundno wacho ni: "Kane wuoyino ok oduogo bang' ndalo manok, luwo wachno ne tek nikech ne ok wanyal yudo min-gi e simu. E kindeno duto, simu mar min-gi ne osim."

eng: According to Mr Omollo, the parent should have made a follow-up at school after receiving the text message alerting them that their boy had been allowed out of school.
luo: Omollo wacho ni janyuolno ne onego obi e skul mondo openj wach nyathine bang' yudo ote ma ne wacho ni wuode ne omi rusa mar wuok e skul.

eng: “We alerted the parent through an SMS after we failed to reach them. Why did they not respond in time after the boy failed to arrive home? We made another follow-up but there was no response,” he said.
luo: Omedo ni “Kane ok wanyal yudo janyuolno e simu ne wa orone ote e simu. Ang'o momiyo ne ok oluwo wachno bang' neno ni nyathino ok ochopo e dala? Ne watemo luwo wachno kendo, to ne ok gidwokowa."

eng: The school head said their records show that on February 2, 2021, the mother went to school and paid Sh4,000 fee, but never sought to know his whereabouts or even inquire about his progress from the class teacher.
luo: Japuonjno wacho ni rekod mag skul nyiso ni miyono ne odhi e skundno Februar  2, 2021, mochulo fis mar siling 4,000.  Ne ok openjo kama wuode nitie, bende ne ok owuoyo gi japuonj nyathino mondo ong'e kaka nyathine timo e skul."

eng: “It is a normal procedure that whenever a parent goes to his child’s school, he or she seeks a class teacher to inquire about their progress or even drop some pocket money for them."
luo: “Pile ka janyuol odhi e skul ma nyathine somoe omanyo japuonj nyathine mondo owuo kode kata oweyone nyathineno pesa moro matin."

eng: "In Kevin’s case, he never had any money in the bursar’s pocket money account,” Omollo said.
luo: Omollo wacho ni; "Rekod mar skul nyiso ni ne ok owene Kevin pesa moro amora."

eng: But the mother said on the day she went to pay the fees, the students were sitting exams, and that was why she never inquired about her son.
luo: Min nyathi to wacho ni chieng' ma ne odhi chulo fis nyithindo ne timo penj kendo mano ema nomiyo ok nopenjo wach wuode.

eng: The claim was, however, contradicted by the school records.
luo: Kata kamano, rekod mar skul to kwedo wachno.

eng: A copy of the school’s official academic calendar that was shared with police probing the matter indicates that students were not sitting exams on the said day.
luo: Kalenda mar skul ma bende ne omi polise nyiso ni nyithindo ne ok tim penj e odiechiengno.

eng: Exams were conducted between February 9 and February 12, and not February 2, as the mother claimed.
luo: Ne otim penj e kind Februar tarik 9 gi Februar tarik 12, to ok Februar tarik 2 kaka miyono ne wacho.

eng: Manga Police Commander Gabriel Mwangangi said the file on Kevin’s disappearance had been forwarded to the Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP).
luo: Gabriel Mwangangi  ma en kamanda ma Manga Police wacho ni fail manyiso lal mar Kevin oseter ne  Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP).

eng: “We heard both parties and we have done investigations and made our recommendations, which we have forwarded to the DPP. It is evident that there was laxity somewhere, but it’s upon the DPP to make a determination on the case,” Mwangangi said.
luo: Mwangangi wacho niya: "Wasewinjo gima skul wacho, bende wasewinjo janyuol. Wasetimo nonro kendo wandiko gima waparo mi watero ne  DPP. Nenore maler ni nitiere kama ne tol ombekoree, kata kamano,  DPP ema dhi ng'ado kesni."

eng: Kemunto described Kevin as a calm person who had few friends.
luo: Kemunto wacho ni  Kevin ne en wuoyi mamuol kendo ne en gi osiepe matin.

eng: “He was always quiet and very conservative. He has never been involved in any vices or bad company,” Kemunto said.
luo: Kemunto wacho ni, “Wuodeno ne en jaling' ahinya, ne ok yot ng'eyo pache. Pok nobedoga gi timbe ma achach kata wuotho gi osiepe maricho."

eng: The family is appealing to anyone who could be having information on the whereabouts of the teenager to report to any police station.
luo: Joodno kwayo ni kapo ni nitie ng'at mong'eyo kama rawerano nitie to oter wachno e polis stesen.

eng: Stop using Otiende’s ouster to divide ODM, Kaluma warns party opponents
luo: Kaluma wacho ne joma kwedo patigi niya; "Weuru pogo ODM gi wach Otiende mogol e komiti."

eng: Homa Bay Town MP Peter Kaluma on Sunday, May 9 accused ODM political enemies of using the recent removal of Rarieda MP Otiende Amollo from a parliamentary committee to divide the party.
luo: ODM ogolo Otiende Amollo, Jabunge ma Rarieda  e komiti mar Od Bura. Chieng' Jumapil, Mei tarik 9, Peter Kaluma ma en  Jabunge ma Homa Bay Town ne owacho ni wasik ODM rendore gi wachno mondo gipoggo ODM.

eng: Speaking at Ogande Girls High School when he supervised the implementation of development projects by the NG-CDF in his constituency, Kaluma accused ODM opponents of blowing the matter out of proportion to taint the party’s image.
luo: Kane Kaluma wuoyo  Ogande Girls High School, kama ne odhi nono kaka chenro mag dongruok ma itimo gi NG-CDF ma konstichuensi mare dhi nyime, ne owacho ni wasik ODM jimbo wach golo Otiende e komiti mondo giketh nying ODM.

eng: “There are people who take advantage of Otiende’s removal to create unnecessary division in the party. They invoke issues which never existed between the MP and the ODM party leadership,” Kaluma said.
luo: Kaluma wacho ni: “Nitie joma rendore gi wach golo Otiende e komiti mondo gipog ji e pati mar ODM. Gisiayo weche ma ne rik onge e kind Jabungeno kod jotelo mag ODM."

eng: Kaluma said it was wrong to blame ODM because of making changes in a parliamentary committee, adding that such changes were normal procedures.
luo: Kaluma wacho ni ok ber keto ketho kuom  ODM nikech lokruoge ma gisetimo e komiti mar Od Bura. Owachoni lokruoge ma kamago gin gik mapile.

eng: “It is normal for a political party to change its members in a parliamentary committee hence the recent change in JLAC should not be an issue,” he said.
luo: Ne owacho ni: “Loko joma nie komiti mar Od Bura en gima timore pile e pati mag siasa. Omiyo lokruoge motim e JLAC ok onego okel wach."

eng: Kaluma said Otiende’s removal should not be misunderstood to be punishment by ODM as some people are trying to portray it.
luo: Kaluma wacho ni golo Otiende e komitino ok en kum ma ODM omiye kaka jomoko wacho.

eng: He said Otiende still wields membership of the powerful Public Accounts Committee (PAC) committee in Parliament.
luo: Owacho ni Otiende pod ni e komiti ma nigi teko mar  Public Accounts Committee (PAC) e Od Bura.

eng: He said Rarieda MP should have been removed from the PAC if ODM had issues with him.
luo: Owacho ni kapo ni ODM ne nigi wach kod Jabunge ma  Rariedano ne digi gole e  PAC.

eng: “If ODM leader Raila Odinga was in Parliament, he would be the one chairing PAC committee because this is a highly valued committee headed by an opposition leader. But Otiende’s membership in the committee means ODM values him,” Kaluma said.
luo: Kaluma wacho niya; “Kapo ni jatelo mar ODM  Raila Odinga ne en Jabunge en ema ne dobedo jakom mar PAC nikech en kom manigi nyadhi kendo jatelo mar pati makwedo sirkal ema kawoga komno. Omiyo, bedo ni Otiende nie komitino nyiso ni ODM ogene."

eng: The MP told ODM supporters and residents of Nyanza region where Otiende hails from to be wary of the enemies.
luo: Jabungeno ne onyiso joma riwo ODM lwedo kod jo  Nyanza mawuok e alwora ma Otiende wuokie mondo otang' gi jowasigu.

eng: “The enemies are out to divide us as a party and as a community but let us stand firm to withstand their dirty plans,” Kaluma said.
luo: Kaluma ne owacho ni: “Jowasigugi dwaro pogo patiwa kendo gidwaro pogo ogandawa. Nyaka wachung' motegno mondo  kik gichochwa gi chenrogi monjawni."

eng: Otiende was recently removed from the vice-chairmanship of the Justice and Legal Affairs Committee (JLAC) in the National Assembly and replaced by Ruaraka MP Tom Kajwang’ over his stance on the Building Bridges Initiative Bill.
luo: Otiende ne en jalup jakom e komiti mar Od Bura mar Justice and Legal Affairs Committee (JLAC) kata kamano, nyocha ne ogole e komno mi kare oket  ma Tom Kajwang'. Ne otim kamano nikech paro motegno ma Tom osegabedogo e wi wach  Building Bridges Initiative.

eng: He told Nyanza residents to be ready for a referendum after the Building Bridges Initiative (BBI) Constitutional Amendment Bill 2020 was approved by parliament.
luo: Kaluma ne owacho ne jo Nyanza mondo oikre ne refarendam bang' kane Od Bura oyie gi wach Building Bridges Initiative (BBI) Constitutional Amendment Bill 2020.

eng: He said time had come for Kenyans to have a new Constitution.
luo: Ne owacho ni kinde osechopo mondo Jo Kenya oyud Chik manyien.

eng: “We are soon going to start campaigns because we are likely to hold the referendum in August this year. Let our people be ready,” Kaluma said.
luo: Kaluma ne owacho niya: “Wabiro chako kampen machiegnini nikech wanyalo bedo gi refarendam Agost higani. Omiyo Iikreuru."

eng: He said the Bill will help fight corruption by compelling the Judiciary to conclude graft cases within a period of one year after being filed.
luo: Owacho ni Chik manyienno biro konyo e kedo gi mibadhi nikech biro chuno Jobura tiekre gi kes mag mibadhi e higa achiel bang' ka osedonj ne ng'ato.

eng: Male nurse arrested in Siaya for defiling Form Two student
luo: Omak nas ma dichwo Siaya nikech noterore gi nyako ma ja Fom 2.

eng: Police in Gem, Siaya County on Friday, May 7, questioned a male nurse for allegedly defiling a Form Two student.
luo: Tich Abich, Mei tarik 7, Polise ma Gem e Kaunti ma Siaya ne onono nas ma dichwo ma wachore ni ne oterore gi nyako ma ja Fom 2.

eng: The nurse based at a health dispensary in Gem sub-county was, however, released because of insufficient evidence.
luo: Nasno tiyo e dispensari moro Gem sab kaunti. Kata kamano ne ogonye nikech ne ok oyud weche moromo mi odonjne e kot.

eng: The nurse is reported to have committed the offence on May 2, but other sources indicated he was having an affair with the minor.
luo: Wachore ni nasno ne oterore gi nyakono Mei tarik 2, jomoko to wacho ni osegabedo gi osiep ma kisera gi nyathino kuom kinde.

eng: Gem sub-county police boss Charles Chacha said they have launched investigations, and that police were trying to piece the evidence together to build a case against the nurse.
luo: Charles Chacha ma en jatelo mar polis e  sab kaunti ma Gem  wacho ni gisechako timo nonro mondo giyud weche madier ma ginyalo donjonego nasno.

eng: He said the nurse denied knowledge of the girl, adding that he was dating an older lady different from the one in question.
luo: Owacho ni nasno ne owacho ni okiya nyakono kendo otimo osiep ma kisera gi nyako moro maduong' mopogore gi nyathino.

eng: "We arrested, questioned the nurse and released him. We have taken the minor to two different health facilities in Siaya and Gem for medical reports but they found nothing tangible that can help us with the investigations," he said.
luo: "Ne wamako ng'atno mi wanone kae to wagonye. Wasetero nyathino e osiptande ariyo mopogore Siaya kod Gem mondo opime to ok giyudo gima nyalo konyowa e nonro ma watimo.", ne owacho.

eng: Chacha said members of the public found the nurse with the 17-year-old girl in his vehicle which was parked near a bush.
luo: Chacha wacho ni raia ema ne oyudo nasno gi nyako ma jahigni apar gabiriyono e mtoke ma ne ochungo e bath bungu moro.

eng: "The investigations may have dragged a little because we did not receive this report at the right time. The parents had first reported to the area chief. They have been trying to solve the matter away from the authorities but pressure from the residents is the reason we got this case," said Chacha.
luo: Chacha wacho ni,"Nonroni osedigni matin nikech ne ok okelnwa ripot e kinde mowinjore. Jonyuol nyakono ne okwongo otero wachno ka chif. Gisetemo loso wachno e kindgi gi nasno kendgi ma ok gikelo wach ka polis. Raia ema omiyo wayudo kesni."

eng: He added: " Most parents have made it difficult for their defiled children to get justice after opting for an out-of-court settlement with the offenders. This is unfair to the victim."
luo: Ne omedo niya: " Thoth jonyuol miyo bedo matek mondo okony nyithindo ma oterruokgo. Ng'enyne gitieko wechego e kindgi giwegi gi ng'at ma oterore gi nyathigi ma ok gikel wach ka sirkal. To mano ok kony nyathi."

eng: Chacha said after learning about the incident, they traced the girl and his parents and took her to the hospital.
luo: Chacha wacho ni kane oternegi wachno, ne gimanyo nyathino kod jonyuolne kae to gitero nyakono e osiptal.

eng: "We cannot arrest him and take him to court yet due to lack of evidence. The girl has been denying everything. She denied knowledge of the nurse when we questioned her," added the sub-county commander.
luo: Kamanda ma sab kaunti wacho niya: "Ok wanyal make kata tere e kot maonge wach ma wayudo kuome manyalo tweye. Nyakono oramo ni okiya gimoro amora e wi wachno. Ne owacho ni okiya dichwogno sama ne wapenje wechego."

eng: He said police are still investigating the matter and will ensure the minor gets justice.
luo: Owacho ni polis pod nono wachno kendo gibiro neno ni okony nyathino kaka owinjore gi chik.

eng: Nyamira County leadership has been put under task to explain how the devolved unit lost Sh2.8 billion in salaries allegedly paid to ghost workers in the financial year 2018/2019.
luo: Jotelo ma Nyamira Kaunti oket mondo oler kaka kauntigi ne olalo siling bilion 2.8 e osara ma wachore ni ne owuondruok ni ochul jotich maonge, kendo miparo apara e higa manie kind  2018/2019.

eng: The burden of the illegal employment that six years ago put Nyaribo in roguer heads with his then boss, the late John Nyagarama resurfaced Friday afternoon, this time round putting Nyaribo in a tight corner with the county's oversight body.
luo: Wach ndiko ji e tich ma ok oluw chik higni auchiel mokalo ne ochier kendo Tich Abich godiechieng'. Wachno ne omieno Nyaribo gi chilo kaachiel gi jatende ma koro osetho John Nyagarama. Wang'ni, wachno thuwe gi jotelo mag kaunti.

eng: The recruitment of the alleged staff led to an increase of Sh3 million paid out as salaries every month. The said employees are said to have been employed without due process.
luo: Jotich manyien ma wachore ni ne ondikgo miyo pes osara medore gi milion 3 dwe ka dwe. Wachore ni ne ondik jotichgo ma ok oluw chik kaka dwarore.

eng: Committee chairman Achilo Ayako who is the Senator Migori tasked the Governor to explain how the County got to a point of recruitment staff without following the right process including placing an advert and allowing the County Public Service Board to carry out interviews.
luo: Achilo Ayako, Seneta ma Migori kendo ma en jakom mar Komitino ne onyiso Gavanano mondo oler kaka Kaunti ne ochopo e okang' mar ndiko ji e tich ma ok gilando wach tije mantie kendo miyo  County Public Service Board thuolo mar wuoyo gi joma indikogo mondo gine ka be giwinjore gi tije midwaro migi.

eng: “These are human beings that should be available physically. This is a mess that occurred more than two years ago but the County Government lacks basic documents to support an irregularity that was committed.”
luo: “Magi gin dhano ma ne owinjore one gi wang' kendo owuogo achiel kachiel. Pi ne oduwore higni ariyo mokalo kendo sirkal mar kaunti onge otese manyalo siro wach mobamni.”

eng: Governor Nyaribo did confirm that there were no proper records to help him trace the alleged ghost workers. “I have commissioned a staff audit process to help unearth the mess that might have been committed.”
luo: Gavana Nyaribo ne oyie ni onge rekod manyalo konyogi fwenyo jotichgi ma wachgi ok ong'ere maler. “Asegolo chik mondo okwan jotich mag kaunti achiel achiel, kendo mano nyalo konyowa chopo e kuku mar wachni.”

eng: The County Public Service Board Chairman Dr Peter Kereri was also at pains to explain whether the said 736 employees were duly employed or not.
luo: Dr Peter Kereri, Jakom mar  The County Public Service Board bende ne oket kama diny mondo oler kabe ji 736 ma wachore ni ne ondik tich ne ondik tich gadier.

eng: Dr Kereri confirmed that the employment of the said staff was done by the County Executive.
luo: Dr Kereri ne owacho ni en adier ni Komiti Mochung' ne Tije mag Kaunti ema ne ondiko ji.

eng: I had not reported to the office at the time but can confirm that there was communication between the board and the executive on the need to employ subordinate staff and some enforcement officers.
luo: Kata kamano, ne ok ati e ofisno gie kindeno, kata kamano, an gadier ni  jo bod kod jo komitino ne owuoyo, kendo ne ging'ado ni owinjore  gindik jotich momedore ma konyo e tije matindo tindo kendo gimed kwan mar jorit.

eng: However, he was not able to table the names of the employed staff nor could he confirm the number of the people who were employed at the time.
luo: Kata kamano, ne ok onyal chiwo nyinge joma ne ondik tich e kindeno, kata kwan margi.

eng: Nyamira Senator Okongo Mogeni said the reinstatement of the 736 staff was done irregularly and through collusion between the County Government and some advocates by signing a consent.
luo: Seneta ma Nyamira Okongo Mogeni ne owacho ni dwoko jotich  736 e tich ne otim ma ok oluw chik. Ne en winjruok e kind Sirkal ma Kaunti gi okil moko kendo ne giketo seyi mar yie ni wachno otimre.

eng: “These people must appear in Court one by one and be charged. They must provide their employment letters to prove that indeed they exist. This is a conspiracy that must be investigated. Somebody must have blocked the court process to have Nyamira residents save billions of money paid to ghost workers.”
luo: “Nyaka ter jogi e Kot , kendo odonjnegi ng'ato achiel achiel. Nyaka ginyis barupe ma ne ondikgigo e tich mondo ong'e ka be gintie adier. Ma en kuo monego onon. Nyaka bed ni ng'ato ne odhi modino ne kot mondo Jo Nyamira okung bilionde mag pesa ma wachore ni ichulo joma onge.”

eng: He added: "There is no ruling over the case as it is being said here. What is filed is just a consent to end the case and reinstate the workers.”
luo: Ne omedo niya: "Ok watiek kesni kaka iwacho kae. Gima timore en mana manyo kaka ji nyalo winjore kae to idwoko jogo e tich.”

eng: Bomet Senator, Benjamin Langat who is also a member of the Committee observed that the County Government lacked proper documentation in almost every document.
luo: Benjamin Langat, Seneta ma Bomet, ma bende nie Komitino ne owacho ni sirkal ma Kauntino ne onge rekod malong'o mar chiegni gimoro amora.

eng: “We want to pin the mess on the actual sinners. Who employed these people? Who mooted the idea to create the vacancies? If they were fired, where are the sacking letters? If they still exist, where do they work?”
luo: “Wadwaro mako joma ne otimo gini. Gin jomage ma ne ondiko jogi e tich? Ng'ano ma ne ochako wach mar bedo gi tije ma imiyo ji? Ka en adier ni ne oriembgi e tich, ere barupe manyiso mano? To kapo ni en adier ni pod gitiyo, to kare gitiyo kanye?”"

eng: The Governor was given 14 days to produce proper documentation to a number of queries that were also raised during the hearings.
luo: Ne omi Gavanano ndalo 14 mondo okel otese machiwo nonro e wi penjo mogwaro ma ne openje.

eng: The Committee has been sitting at the Kisii County Assembly hall for the past one week.
luo: Komitino osebedo ka romo e Od Bura ma  Kisii Kaunti kuom  juma achiel mokalo.

eng: Migori Governor Okoth Obado who was set to be grilled on Thursday morning snubbed the committee hearings.
luo: Gavana ma Migori  Okoth Obado ma ne owinjore openj penjo Tich Ang'wen gokinyi ne ofwayo wachno kendo ne ok odhi e nyim komitino.

eng: Homa Bay County Governor Cyprian Awiti also could not attend the hearings.
luo: Cyprian Awiti, Gavana ma Homa Bay Kaunti bende ne ok nyal chopo e nyim komitino.

eng: He was to appear before the committee on Friday morning.
luo: Ne onego odhi e nyim komitino Tich Abich gokinyi.

eng: Migori MCAs on Thursday, May 6, refuted claims that Majority Leader Ken Ouma and chief whip Kevins Keke were ousted because they are People’s Democratic Party (PDP) sympathisers.
luo: Chieng' Tich Ang'wen, Mei, tarik 6 Jo Od Bura ma Migori  ne owacho ni ok en adier ni Ken Ouma ma ne en Ja Od Bura Mawuoyo e lo Pati kod Kevins Keke ma ne en Ja Od Bura ma Neno ni Oluw Chik ne ogol nikech ne giriwo lwedo pati mar  People’s Democratic Party (PDP).

eng: PDP links rock Migori Assembly as MCAs oust majority leader, whip
luo: Joma tudore gi PDP kelo tungni e Od Bura ma Migori Assembly sama Jo Od Bura (MCAs) golo Ja Od Bura Mawuoyo e lo Pati kod Ja Od Bura ma Neno ni Oluw Chik

eng: County Assembly Speaker Boaz Okoth said out of 41 MCAs from ODM, 27 signed for the removal of the two.
luo: Boaz Okoth, ma en Jatelo mar Od Bura ma Kaunti ne owacho ni kuom  Jo Od Bura 41 mag  ODM,  27 ne oketo seyi ni ogol ji ariyogo e migepegi.

eng: The duo’s removal came after ODM MCAs served the speaker with a report containing the changes they wanted to be made.
luo: Ne ogol ji ariyogo bang' Jo Od Bura ma ODM miyo Jatelo mar Od Bura ripot ma ne nyiso lokruoge ma gidwaro timo.

eng: According to Okoth, ODM MCAs resolved to elect Owiyo as Majority Leader and his East Kamagambo counterpart Nyawade as the assembly’s chief whip.
luo: Okoth wacho ni Jo Od Bura ma  ODM ne ong'ado mar keto  Owiyo mondo obed Jal Mawuoyo e lo Jo Od Bura, to  Nyawade ma nyawadgi ma  East Kamagambo mondo obed Jal ma Neno ni Oluw Chik e Od Bura.

eng: Masaba MCA Abedy Marowa accused the ousted Majority leader of delaying the Building Bridges Initiative (BBI) motion in the assembly and that he was supporting the PDP agenda.
luo: Abedy Marowa ma en  Ja Od Bura ma Masaba  ne owacho ni Ken Ouma ne omiyo Od Bura odeko gi chwalo wach  Building Bridges Initiative (BBI) kendo ne oriwo lwedo chenro mag PDP.

eng: "Members found that the ousted leaders were bankrolling PDP issues," claimed Marowa.
luo: Marowa ne owacho ni "Jo Od Bura ofwenyo ni ji ariyo mogolgo osebedo ka siro PDP gi pesa."

eng: West Kanyamkago MCA Peter Mijungu described the ousted Majority leader as the greatest PDP sympathiser.
luo: Peter Mijungu, MCA ma West Kanyamkago  ne owacho ni Ken Ouma ma ne ogolno ohero PDP tho gi kwo.

eng: Ouma (South Sakwa Ward) and Keke (South Kamagambo) were on Wednesday ousted in a heated session that has led to cracks in the assembly.
luo: Ouma (South Sakwa Ward) kod Keke (South Kamagambo) ne ogol e migepegi Tich Adek. Wachno ne liet e Od Bura mochako pogo Jobura.

eng: Ouma and Keke termed their removal as unfair, adding that those who pushed for their removal were ‘PDP sympathisers trying to woo locals’.
luo: Ouma kod Keke wacho ni ne ok owinjore ogolgi e migepegi, kendo jogo ma ne osiayo wach ni ogolgi gin joma ohero PDP nyamin anega kendo gidwaro ywayo raia mondo oriwre kodgi.

eng: Ouma said his removal was intimidation after he questioned the misappropriation of funds.
luo: Ouma wacho ni ogole nikech ne openjo gimomiyo ne oti gi pesa marach. Owacho ni gidwaro bwoge.

eng: Owiyo who is the newly elected Majority leader said ODM leaders in the assembly never had any meeting or consensus 'with a party called PDP'.
luo: Owiyo ma koro eka omi migawo mar bedo Jal Mawuoyo e lo Jobura ne owacho ni Bura ne ok obedo gi romo moro amora kata gi winjruok moro amora gi pati miluongo ni PDP.

eng: He said the process of restructuring the assembly leadership should not be politicised, adding that no member met any PDP officials.
luo: Ne owacho ni wach mar timo lokruok e telo mar bura ok onego omien gi siasa. Ne omedo ni onge jabura moro amora ma ne oromo gi jotend PDP.

eng: "Members of ODM have a mandate and the obligation to choose the people they want and remove those whom they feel are not fulfilling their mandates. All that is being said is out of anger," said Owiyo said.
luo: Owiyo ne owacho ni,"Jo ODM nigi ratiro kendo ting' mar yiero joma gidwaro kendo golo joma gineno ni ok tim migepegi kaka dwarore. Gik ma ji wacho sani en mana nikech mirima."

eng: Nyawade said it was unfortunate that the reshuffling of the top seats was being linked to PDP sympathisers.
luo: Nyawade ne owacho ni en gima lit ni lokruoge ma gitimo e migepe mag telo itudo gi joma omakore gi pati mar PDP.

eng: There has been political heat in Migori following the defection of Governor Okoth Obado to PDP.
luo: Siasa osechwakore Migori bang Gavana Okoth Obado donjo e pati mar PDP.

eng: ODM faulted Governor Obado’s defection to PDP with the MCAs, threatening to impeach him.
luo: ODM wacho Gavana Obado owegi kendo odhi PDP  nikech Jo Od Bura  ne wacho ni gibiro donjone.

eng: A man accused of killing a butcher man in Homa Bay County will be detained for seven days before being charged in court.
luo: Dichwo moro ma wachore ni onego Jabucha moro e Kaunti ma Homa Bay biro bet e sel kuom ndalo abiriyo kae to itere e kot.

eng: The suspect is accused of killing Martin Owiti in Rodi Kopany last Wednesday.
luo: Iwacho ni ng'atno ne onego Martin Owiti e alwora mar Rodi Kopany, Tich Adek mokalo.

eng: Police on Monday obtained court orders to continue detaining him pending completion of investigations.
luo: Chieng' Wuok Tich kot ne omiyo polise rusa mondo gimed tweye e sel sama pod inono wechego.

eng: In an affidavit sworn by Ben Wanyama who is attached to Homa Bay Directorate of Criminal Investigations, he said he was yet to record statements from witnesses.
luo: Ben Wanyama matiyo gi Homa Bay Directorate of Criminal Investigations  ne owacho ni pok ondiko ripot mowuok kuom joma noneno wachno.

eng: “A postmortem examination on the deceased has not been done nor has the mental assessment of the suspect. I pray to the court to grant us seven more days to enable us complete investigations,” Wanyama told court.
luo: Wanyama ne onyiso kot niya: "Lakteche pok oyang'o ng'at mothono mondo gifweny gima ne onege, bende pok onon ng'at monekono ka be wiye ber kata ooyo. Akwayo ni kot omedwa ndalo abiriyo mondo watiek nono wechegi.”

eng: Homa Bay Senior Principal Magistrate Thomas Obutu granted the orders.
luo: Janga'd bura mar  Homabay Thomas Obutu nochiwo chike go.

eng: The butcher was reportedly stabbed with a knife inside his butchery at about 9.35pm on Wednesday. The motive of the attack is unknown. Owiti’s body was moved to Homa Bay County Referral Hospital mortuary.
luo: Ja us ring'o no nochwo pala e i bucha ne Tich adek sa adek gi dakika pier adek gi abich otieno. Gima nomiyo ochuoye pod ok ong'e. Ringre mar Owiti noter e od joma otho ma nitie e i osiptal mar county ma Homa Bay.

eng: A driver who was sacked by Jaramogi Oginga Odinga University of Science and Technology has been awarded Sh342,316 for a breach of his contract.
luo: Dreva ma nene ogol e i tich gi mbalariany ma Oginga Odinga mar Sayans gi Teknoloji nene omi siling' 342,316  kaka chudo mar ketho winjruok.

eng: Justice Stephen Radido of the Kisumu Employment and Labour court observed that Edwin Mutanda was fairly sacked for forging a work ticket and his argument that he was being victimised because he was a union official was untenable.
luo: Jang'ad bura Stephen Radido mar kot mar jotich mar Kisumu nene ong'ado bure ni Edwin Mutanda nene ogol e i tich e yo makare ne richo mar chiwo otiko mar tich mar miriambo to ywak ne ni iriambo ne nikech an jatend jotich nene ok owinj.

eng: “The court finds that the summary dismissal of Mutanda was fair. But I will award him a sum for the breach of his employment contract,” said the judge last week.
luo: Od bura oyudo ni Mutanda noriemb e itich e yo makare. Kata kamano abiro mie pesa nikech ketho winjruok mar tich, jang'ad-bura nowacho juma mokalo.

eng: Mutanda alleged that he was victimised on the grounds of his being a deputy secretary of the Kenya Universities Staff Union (KUSU) and for having agreed to be a witness in a criminal complaint against the vice-chancellor.
luo: Mutanda nowacho ni ohangne nikech ne en jakony jandiko mar Kenya Univesities Staff Union (KUSU) kendo noyie bedo janeno ei ywakruok mar mahundu ma noyuag ni jatend mbalariany no.

eng: The university, however, contended that his dismissal was based on his negligence and careless performance of his duties. The particulars given were that he falsified a work ticket.
luo: Mbalariany no, kata kamano, nowacho ni nogole ei tich nikech ne ok odew tich kendo nojwang'o tich mo mie. Gino ma ne nyiso mago ne en otiko mar miriambo ma nochiwo.

eng: The court found out that the entries in the work ticket were deliberate and were meant to claim a higher daily subsistence allowance.
luo: Od bura noyudo ni gik ma nondiko ei otiko ne gin miriambo mondo omi ochule pesa ma oloyo ma onego oyud pile ka pile.

eng: Mutanda challenged the university’s disciplinary process on several grounds, including that the committee was not properly constituted because “it was co-chaired by the VC and was thus biased.”
luo: Mutanda noyudo richo e i yo ma nolu ndalo ma ning'ado bura no, mano ka en kar achiel gi yo mar ne o tigo ka iloso komiti nikech "achiel kuom jokom ne en jatend mbalariany omiyo ne ong'ad bura nyakonchiel.

eng: He also argued that trade union officials present during the hearing of his case did not represent his interest in the true letter and spirit of unionism.
luo: Kendo ne okelo ywak ni jotend chama mar jotich ma ne nitie e chieng winj mar buche no ne ok ochung' ne kore e i adiera kendo gi chuny mar chama no.

eng: The hearing of a case in which Nandi Governor Stephen Sang has been accused of destroying a tea plantation worth Sh2 million was adjourned after he failed to appear in court over Covid-19 fears.
luo: Bura momako Gavana ma Nandi Stephene Sang ma nodonjne gi ketho mar ketho puoth chai ma nyalo golo siling ma dirom milion 2, nochor nyime nikech ne ok ochopo e nyim doho to mano en nikech luoro ma nitie ka luwore gi tuwo mar Covid 19.

eng: Mr Sang was expected to appear in person for the start of the hearing of the case.
luo: Ne dwarore ni migosi Sang ochop e nyim doho mondo e ka ochak winj burano.

eng: Prosecution had lined up four witnesses to testify against him.
luo: Jachung sirikal e doho ne oseiko joneno ang’wen ma ne dhi chiwo neno ni notimo kethono.

eng: The governor’s lawyer June Maasai yesterday told Senior Resident Magistrate Beryl Omollo his client had exhibited Covid-19 symptoms and was in isolation.
luo: June Maasai ma e okil mochung’ne, nyoro onyiso Jangad bura maduong Beryl Omolo ni migosi Sang ne nigi ranyisi mar tuwo mar Covid 19 kendo ni koro okete kar tenge.

eng: The accused was in close contact with the deceased when the deceased was still in hospital.
luo: Gavana ma odonjne gi kethono ne ni machiegni gi jatuo moro ma ne ni osiptal kendo jatuono noduogo otho.

eng: He was also in contact with some relatives during the burial preparations.
luo: Bende ne en machiegni gi wede moko sama ne itimo  chenro mar iko jalo.

eng: The court heard that the government had since conducted Covid-19 tests on officials and eight samples had turned positive.
luo: Doho nowinjo ni sirkal nopimo ji mopogore opogore kendo noyud ni ji aboro nigi tuwo mar Covid 19.

eng: The prosecution and lawyers representing the complainants in the case had protested over delays in the hearing of the case and claimed it had stalled for more than two years.
luo: Ngat mochungne sirikal kod okinde mochung' ne bura nochwalo ng'urgi ni burano oseyware ahinya kendo wacho ni burano osebedo ka digni kuom higni mokalo ariyo.

eng: The prosecutor, Sylvester Thuo, backed the push to have the matter adjourned, but raised concerns over the slow process.
luo: Sylvester Thuo ma e jachung mar piny owacho ochung' ne kesno noriwo lwedo wach choro kesno nyime, kata kamano, ne ok omor gi yo ma kesno ywarego.

eng: The magistrate granted Sang an adjournment but directed that the court be supplied with a medical report on the governor’s health within two weeks.
luo: Jang'ad bura noyie ni kes mar migosi Sang ninyalo chwal nyime to okwayo mondo omi doho ripot ma nyiso kaka ngima gavana chalo ka pok jumbe ariyo orumo.

eng: “The matter was first brought to court on June 2019. It now qualifies as a backlog,” said Thuo.
luo: Thuo nowacho kama: "Kesni nokel e nyim doho dwe mar auchiel e higa mar 2019. Sani koro inyalo wach ni en nonego bed ni oserumo."

eng: “The hearing date will be fixed on the next mention date,” said Omollo.
luo: Mikayi Omollo nowacho niya: "Chieng' ma ibiro yalie kesno ibo wach ka jo ma otudore gi kesni oromo kendo."

eng: Aman burned a relative's cow after he was denied a cup of milk in Bomwagamo, Nyamira County.
luo: E gweng' mar Bomwagamo ma yudore e Kaunti ma Nyamira, jago moro nowang'o dher watne nikech notuone chak.

eng: Nyambiri assistant chief Peter Oyange said the assailant later surrendered to the police and confessed to burning the lactating cow in the shed after being denied a cup of milk.
luo: Jalup chif ma Nyambiri migosi Peter Oyange nowacho ni jagono noduogo odhi ir stesend obila kendo yie ni nodhi motiayo mach kama ne dhiang' ma ne inyiedhono nitie nikech notuone chak okombe achiel.

eng: The cow died in the inferno.
luo: Dhiang'no notho e majno.

eng: Mr Oyange is said to have executed the awful incident at around 4am on Tuesday while the owners were asleep.
luo: Wachore ni Oyange notimo tim marachno chieng' Tich Ariyo kar sa apar okinyi sama ne wuon dhiang'no nindo.

eng: It is yet to be established what charges police plan to charge the suspect with.
luo: Pok ong'ere ni en ketho mane ma polis biro donjonego ng'ano.

eng: Nyamira County Commissioner Amos Mariba said there are concerns over rising cases of substance abuse among the youth that has contributed to an increase in cases of lawlessness in the county.
luo: Jatend sirikal ma Kaunti ma Nyamira Amos Mariba ogolo milome ni rowere mathoth tiyo gi yedhe ma mero ji to mano miyo timbe ma achach omedore e kauntino.

eng: "We suspect such incidences could be linked to substance abuse among young people. Our fight against the vice is a notch higher and we hope to bring the situation under control," Mariba said.
luo: Mariba nowacho kama: "Wachich ni timbe kaka mago medore nikech rowere tiyo gi yedhe ma mero ji. Wadwa medo rang'iny ma wakwedogo timbe kaka mago kendo wageno ni timbego biro dok chien."

eng: This is the second incident involving the maiming or killing of animals to happen in the area within a period of less than two months.
luo: Kuom kinde ma ok rom dweche ariyo, gi ma chalo kama osetimore diriyo e gweng'ni ka inego chiaye kata miyo obed gi ng'ol moro.

eng: In March, an unknown person moved into an elderly woman's homestead and slashed her pregnant heifer’s hind legs, rendering it immobile.
luo: E dwe mar adek, ng'at moro nodhi e dala dayo moro kendo tong'o tiende dher dayoni. Noyudo dheno iye odongo kendo mano momiyo koro ok onyal wuotho.

eng: The once vibrant Yala town is now in the doldrums after the closure of Odera Akang’o College campus that gave it a lifeline.
luo: Boma ma Yala ma e kinde mokalo ne en kama ji ng'enyie kendo modich, sani ong'ich-ng'ich nikech nolor skund tiegruok ma Odera Akang'o.

eng: When the campus that was a constituent college of Moi University was shut in 2019, the livelihoods of more than 50,000 people was affected.
luo: Ka ne olor skundno, ma ne en bad mbalariany ma Moi e higa mar 2019, ngima mar jo ma diromo 50,000 nochochni.

eng: The town, situated along Kisumu-Busia highway in Gem Sub-county, suffered as a result of closed businesses, deserted restaurants and vacant rental houses.
luo: Taon ma yudore e apaya ma wuok Kisumu Kochomo Busia kendo e sab-kaonti ma Gem, noyudo ng'ikruok nikech nolor ute ohala, otende kendo udi ma ne ji opango odong' nono.

eng: Business people and residents now say the town has lost its glory.
luo: Jotim ohala kod jo ma odak e taondno wachno ni sani taondno olalo huma ma ne en-go.

eng: “A lot of traders have closed their businesses,” said Peter Adhaya, chairman of Yala Young Traders Association.
luo: Peter Adhaya ma  e jakom mar riwruok miluongo ni Yala Young Traders Association, wacho kama: "Jotim ohala mathoth oseloro ohendnigi."

eng: “When the university was still operating, business was good. Students would do everything within Yala town. Now rental houses have been converted to guest rooms, but there are no customers,” said Mr Adhaya.
luo: "Kinde ma ne skundno tiyo, ohelni ne dhi maber. Jo ma ne somo e skundno ne nyalo timo gimoro e taondwaka. Sani to koro ute ma nipango olok mondo obed ute ma jowuoth nyalo ninde, to joma dinind kuno be onge."

eng: Those who had shops and eateries around the hostels and the university were the worst-hit.
luo: Joma ohendnigi okethore moloyo gin jo ma ne nigi dukni kod otende machiegni gi skundno.

eng: Businessman Asis Awan, 62, who was born in Yala town, said businesses in the area have gone down by 50 per cent since the closure of Odera Akang’o College.
luo: Jatim ohala miluongo ni Asis Awan ma jahigni 62 kendo ma nonyuol e taondno wacho ni ohala odok piny gi pasent 50 nyaka ne lor Odera Akango.

eng: Awan said business people who spent millions of shillings to put up rental houses and hostels are counting losses since some of them had taken loans.
luo: Awan wacho ni jo ma notiyo gi omuom mang'eny mondo giger ute mideso kod ka ma ji nindoe oyudo lal maduong' ahinya nikech ne gikawo pes hola kata loan.

eng: He revealed that his hardware business has not been spared as construction projects have stalled or gone down.
luo: Nowacho ni kata mana ohande mar hadware be ne ok dhi maber nikech tij gedo mathoth e taondno ochung kendo ji matin sana e ma sani gedo.

eng: Mr Awan, a member of the National Committee of Chamber of Commerce and Siaya branch representative, said there was no hope of businesses getting better.
luo: Migosi Awan ma en achiel kuom jo ma ni e komiti miluongo ni National Committee of Chambers of Commerce  kendo en e ma ochung' ne jotim ohala ma Siaya nowacho  ni ok one ka weche dhi bedo maber kodgi.

eng: Agnes Achieng, a vegetable vendor who had a stall just opposite the college where several hostels are situated, said she had to move to the market centre to start all over again.
luo: Agnes Achieng ma ne nigi kibanda momanyore gi kama sikund nitie kendo ma ne ni machiegni gi kama nyithi skundno odakie, wacho ni nochune ni mondo odhi ochak ohandeno  e chiiro.

eng: “I stayed at home for two months trying to strategise. My vegetable business collapsed in 2019. I had a stall where most of the students were living and when all of them finally left, my business collapsed,” said Achieng.
luo: Achieng' wacho niya: "Nabedo pacho kuom dweche ariyo katemo omo fwa. Ohanda mar loko alot nopodho e higa mar 2019. Ne an gi kibanda machiegni gi kuma thoth nyithind skundo nodakie, to ka giduto ne giwuok, ohanda ne opodho.

eng: The campus was launched in 2008 as a satellite campus with only 32 students.
luo: Skundno ne ochak e higa mar 2008 kaka bad mbalariany ma Moi ka en mana gi jopuonjre 32.

eng: The college did not receive government-sponsored students from Moi University for some years, but managed to admit privately sponsored learners.
luo: Skundno ne ok oyudo nyithindo ma ne sirkal chudonegi kuom higni mogwaro koa e mbalariany ma Moi. Kata kamano, ne en gi nyithindo ma ne chudo kigin.

eng: Before its closure, the college had received an ultimatum from the Commission of University Education that it risked closure if the management did not get 50 hectares of land for expansion after an inspection in 2016.
luo: Ka pok ne olore, ne oridne chik gi Commission of University Educaton

eng: The Commission of University Education had given the campus a timeline of two years to ensure all the requirements were met by February 2018 when another inspection was to be conducted before a final decision was made.
luo: Bad sirikal ma ngiyo yore somo e Kenya - Commission of University Education -nomiyogi higni ariyo nyaka dwe mar a

eng: Odera Akang’o College campus, which currently sits on six hectares, had 1,142 privately sponsored students at the time of its closure.
luo: Odera Akang'o ma sani ni e lo ma romo heka 6, ne nigi nyithindo 1142 ma ne chudo kigin kane pok ochop kinde ma ne olore.

eng: In a bid to beat the closure warning, the college had received 90 hectares in Nyamininia near Yala.
luo: Ka gitemo kasore mondo kik tarigno owegi oko, sikundno noyudo lo heka 90 kama iluongo ni Nyamininia man machiegni gi Yala.

eng: The county government committed Sh35 million two years ago to help improve, construct and refurbish the campus structures and it was to offer tuition scholarships to its staff in return.
